text: Barbara the Fair with the Silken Hair () is a 1970 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Alexander Rou.8 советских красавиц, о которых мало кто помнитВарвара-краса, длинная коса It stars Mikhail Pugovkin, Georgy Millyar, and Anatoly Kubatsky. ==Actors== * Mikhail Pugovkin as tsar Yeremei (the king) * Georgy Millyar as Chudo-Yudo (slavic monster, the underwater king) * Anatoly Kubatsky as Afonya, dyak * Aleksei Katyshev as Andrey, son of a fisherman * Sergei Nikolaev as Andrey, the tsar's son * Tatiana Klyueva as Varvara-beauty, daughter of Chudo-Yudo * Varvara Popova as Stepanida, nanny == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Barbara the Fair with the Silken Hair
